!Warehouse Keeper Hagger: To tell you about myself, I can say that I was one of the initial members of the coin collecting club. Other folks made fun of me for gathering various things, but I was simply collecting coins. However... Due to a number of different reasons, I'm still at level 3... OK, OK. Take a look at the coin list that I boast of. If there's something you'd like to exchange, please bring me *Silver Unicorn, Gold Wyvern or Blood Medusa coins*.
